situation.title: Services
situation.meta_description: Providing service trades is not allowed at this time.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Service providers with an establishment may be open, but organisational measures are necessary.

If you use any of the services, follow the hygiene rules. Wear a veil or respirator, keep spacing and regular disinfection or hand washing. The service provider must wear a face shield if the nature of the service allows it.

There may be 1 customer per 15m² in the establishments. In establishments smaller than 15m², this restriction will not apply to persons under 15 years of age and holders of a disability card. In the case of establishments larger than 15m², this rule will not apply to children under 6 years of age accompanying another customer.

Holders of a disability card will have a priority right to enter establishments so that they do not have to wait in queues if they occur.

Regime and organizational measures and queue management (inside and outside) are also needed.

update.processed:
Services will generally have to be closed, but there will probably be exceptions, the following:

 

  • The opening hours of the establishment will be limited from 5:00 to 22:59, and will remain closed on Sundays and on public and non-public holidays.
  • Six people will be allowed to enter the premises, it will still be the case that 15m² of space must be reserved for one customer. In establishments smaller than 15m², this restriction will not apply to persons under 15 years of age and holders of a disability card. If the establishment is larger than 15m², this rule will not apply to children under 6 years of age accompanying another customer.
  • Holders of a disability card will have a priority right to enter establishments so that they do not have to wait in queues.

Specific rules, necessary organisational measures and exceptions will be specified in the newly issued government regulations when announcing the PES level 4. The exact date is not known and will depend on the epidemiological situation, according to the PES points system.
